mapper.select: SELECT games.id, name, platform, genre, price FROM games_platforms INNER JOIN games ON games_platforms.games_id = games.id INNER JOIN platforms ON games_platforms.platforms_id = platforms.id ORDER BY games.id ASC;

SELECT games.id, name, platform, genre, price FROM games_platforms INNER JOIN games ON games_platforms.games_id = games.id INNER JOIN platforms ON games_platforms.platforms_id = platforms.id ORDER BY games.id DESC;

SELECT games.id, name, platform, genre, price FROM games_platforms INNER JOIN games ON games_platforms.games_id = games.id INNER JOIN platforms ON games_platforms.platforms_id = platforms.id WHERE games.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO games (name, genre, platform, price) VALUES(#{name}, #{genre}, #{platform}, #{price})
